name: Save The Snowlings - B&W Jam
description:
The snowlings are in danger! There are evil sunlings everywhere chasing them down!
You must capture the snowlings and bring them to safety. You're the only one who can save winter!

Controls: 

WASD - Arrow keys to move

Mouse to aim

Left click once to catch a snowling, release to throw it

You can throw the snowlings at the enemies to destroy them!

Made in two weeks for the Black & White jam

By Victor Gabler & Andre Diaz
Music by Ketsa
